arts.ttl: Spurs boss Ange Postecoglou lambasts Timo Werner display in Ibrox draw
arts.sum: He wasn't playing anywhere near the level he should," Postecoglou said when asked about Werner being withdrawn at the break. Tottenham boss Ange Postecoglou did not hold back with his criticism of forward Timo Werner after a 1-1 draw at Rangers in the Europa League.

arts.ttl: The Brennan Johnson moment that resulted in Tottenham change after Ange Postecoglou impact
arts.sum: It was his sixth goal in six games for Tottenham after chipping in with some big moments for the club, with the run starting with a last-minute winner at Coventry City in the Carabao Cup as Tottenham avoided an embarrassing exit at the first time of asking. Certainly needing time to adapt to a new football club and also Ange Postecoglou's ways, supporters saw a new side to Johnson in 2024 as he started to have a bigger say in attack for the Lilywhites.

arts.ttl: Club ready to invest as initial contact made with Tottenham star over transfer
arts.sum: Tottenham striker Richarlison has reportedly attracted interest from Brazilian giants Fluminense, who are keen to secure the 27-year-old’s services during the upcoming winter transfer window. Despite being under contract at Spurs until 2027, Richarlison’s persistent injury woes and inconsistent performances have led to speculation about his future in North London.
